text: {{Infobox writer | name = Michael Ende | image = | birth_date = | birth_place = Garmisch, Germany | death_date = | death_place = Filderstadt, Germany | occupation = Fiction writer | period = 1960–1995 | genre = Fantasy, children's fiction | movement = | notableworks= | website = | signature = Michael-Ende-Unterschrift.png }} Michael Andreas Helmuth Ende (12 November 1929 – 28 August 1995) was a German writer of fantasy and children's fiction. He was born in Garmisch-Partenkirchen, Bavaria. He wrote fantasy books for children. He died of stomach cancer in Filderstadt, Baden-Wuerttemberg. ==His books== *Momo (1973) *The Neverending Story (1979) Category:1929 births Category:1995 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Germany Category:Deaths from stomach cancer Category:German children's writers Category:Writers from Bavaria
title: Michael Ende
